UPDATE ESS_APPLY_WH SET ACTIVITY = #ACTIVITY#, CON_REMARK = #CON_REMARK#, UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE, UPDATED_BY = #UPDATED_BY# WHERE EMPID =#EMPID# AND ACTIVITY = 0 AND WH_NO = #WH_NO#
UPDATE ESS_APPLY_OT SET ACTIVITY = #ACTIVITY#, CON_REMARK = #CON_REMARK#, UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE, UPDATED_BY = #UPDATED_BY# WHERE ACTIVITY = 0 AND OT_NO = #APPLY_NO#
UPDATE ESS_APPLY_LEAVE SET ACTIVITY = #ACTIVITY#, CON_REMARK = #CON_REMARK#, UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE, UPDATED_BY = #UPDATED_BY# WHERE ACTIVITY = 0 AND LEAVE_NO = #APPLY_NO#

UPDATE ESS_APPLY_BT SET ACTIVITY = #ACTIVITY#, CON_REMARK = #CON_REMARK#, UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE, UPDATED_BY = #UPDATED_BY# WHERE ACTIVITY = 0 AND BT_NO = #APPLY_NO#

sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO AR_APPLY_RESULT (APPLY_NO, EMPID, APPLY_TYPE, APPLY_DATE, FROM_TIME, TO_TIME, APPLY_DEDUCT, APP_TYPE) SELECT EAO.OT_NO, EAO.EMPID, EAO.OT_TYPE_CODE, EAO.OT_DATE + EAO.OT_DATE_S_FLAG, TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(EAO.OT_DATE + EAO.OT_DATE_S_FLAG, 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' ' || EAO.OT_FROM_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(EAO.OT_DATE + EAO.OT_DATE_E_FLAG, 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' ' || EAO.OT_TO_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), EAO.OT_DEDUCTION, #APPLY_TYPE# FROM ESS_APPLY_OT EAO WHERE EAO.OT_NO = #APPLY_NO# AND EAO.ACTIVITY = 1

INSERT INTO AR_APPLY_RESULT (APPLY_NO, EMPID, APPLY_TYPE, APPLY_DATE, FROM_TIME, TO_TIME, APPLY_DEDUCT, APP_TYPE) SELECT EAL.LEAVE_NO, EAL.EMPID, EAL.LEAVE_TYPE_CODE, TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(EAL.LEAVE_FROM_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD'), EAL.LEAVE_FROM_TIME, EAL.LEAVE_TO_TIME, 0, #APPLY_TYPE# FROM ESS_APPLY_LEAVE EAL WHERE EAL.LEAVE_NO = #APPLY_NO# AND EAL.ACTIVITY = 1

INSERT INTO AR_MAC_RECORD (RECORD_NO, CARD_ID, EMPID, R_TIME, ATT_DATE, CARD_DOOR_TYPE, IN_FLAG, ACTIVITY, CREATE_DATEï¼Œ CREATED_BY) SELECT AR_MAC_RECORD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, EAC.CARD_ID, EAC.EMPID, EAC.R_TIME, EAC.ATT_DATE, EAC.CARD_DOOR_TYPE, 'H', 1, SYSDATE, #CREATED_BY# FROM ESS_APPLY_CARD EAC WHERE EAC.CARD_NO = #APPLY_NO# AND EAC.ACTIVITY = 1

INSERT INTO AR_APPLY_RESULT (APPLY_NO, EMPID, APPLY_TYPE, APPLY_DATE, FROM_TIME, TO_TIME, APPLY_DEDUCT, APP_TYPE) SELECT EABT.BT_NO, EABT.EMPID, EABT.BT_TYPE_CODE, TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(EABT.BT_FROM_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD'), EABT.BT_FROM_TIME, EABT.BT_TO_TIME, 0, #APPLY_TYPE# FROM ESS_APPLY_BT EABT WHERE EABT.BT_NO = #APPLY_NO# AND EABT.ACTIVITY = 1
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM AR_APPLY_RESULT WHERE APPLY_NO = #APPLY_NO# AND APP_TYPE = #APPLY_TYPE#

DELETE FROM ESS_AFFIRM WHERE APPLY_NO = #APPLY_NO# AND APPLY_TYPE = #APPLY_TYPE#
DELETE FROM AR_DETAIL WHERE EMPID = #EMPID# AND AR_DATE_STR = (SELECT TO_CHAR(ATT_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') FROM ESS_APPLY_CARD EAC WHERE EAC.CARD_NO = #APPLY_NO#)

DELETE FROM AR_MAC_RECORD WHERE EMPID = #EMPID# AND R_TIME = (SELECT R_TIME FROM ESS_APPLY_CARD EAC WHERE EAC.CARD_NO = #APPLY_NO#) AND ATT_DATE = (SELECT ATT_DATE FROM ESS_APPLY_CARD EAC WHERE EAC.CARD_NO = #APPLY_NO#) AND CARD_DOOR_TYPE = (SELECT CARD_DOOR_TYPE FROM ESS_APPLY_CARD EAC WHERE EAC.CARD_NO = #APPLY_NO#)
DELETE FROM AR_APPLY_RESULT WHERE APPLY_NO = #APPLY_NO# AND APP_TYPE = #APPLY_TYPE#
